item.title: Potato Wedges and Gorgonzola Sauce - Nigel Slater
item.description: INGREDIENTS 1 kg Floury Potatoes 8 rashers of Smoked Streaky Bacon 5 tbsp Groundnut or Rapeseed Oil 1 tbsp crushed Chilli Flakes 1 tbsp Smoked Paprika for the Dressing 250ml Double Cream 150g Gorgonzola or Dolcelatte (any blue cheese will work but milder & sweeter is better)
